Digital design & front-end development

Bolder —

2016–present Front-end development, Wordpress integration

Bolder launched in March 2016 with a mission to champion people casting aside age stereotypes and doing inspirational and interesting things as they grow older. The blog is run by friends and former colleagues Helen Cathcart and Dominique Afacan, a photographer and writer respectively.

A fresh look for 2017

The new website was built by myself in early 2017 using Wordpress. Check it out here.

Website design by Julia Murray.

The Old Website

The first version of this blog was built on the Tumblr blogging platform.
